bioghist.p: C. Mervin Palmer was an aquatic biologist for the Biological Treatment Research Activities, Cincinnati Water Research Laboratory, Advanced Waste Treatment Branch. In 1949 Palmer worked as voluntary field scientific officer for UNESCO Science Cooperation Office for South Asia. He was Temporary Advisor to the Pan American Health Organization, Sanitary Bureau, Rio de Janiero, Brazil in 1969.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of the papers of C. Mervin Palmer. Materials include: notes for courses Palmer took at Pennsylvania State College; course and lecture notes for classes he taught at Butler University; handwritten and typescript drafts for articles and manuals by Palmer, many on the topic of algae and water sanitation; index card files containing bibliographic listings, species information, and professional contacts; algae illustrations by species; reports and correspondence from Palmer's projects as a consultant; articles and theses on algae and other botanical topics by colleagues and students of Palmer; miscellaneous notes, lists, and correspondence.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
